mapper.select: SELECT menu.menuName, dorder.menuQuantity, torder.orderReceivedTime, user.userNickname, torder.orderFlag FROM TOrder AS torder, TOrderDetail AS dorder, TUser AS user, TCafe AS cafe, TMenu AS menu WHERE user.userIDX = torder.userIDX AND cafe.cafeIDX = torder.cafeIDX AND menu.menuIDX = dorder.menuIDX AND dorder.orderDetailIDX = torder.orderDetailIDX AND torder.cafeIDX = #{cafeIDX} ORDER BY torder.orderIDX DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT menu.menuName, dorder.menuQuantity, torder.orderReceivedTime, user.userNickname, torder.orderFlag FROM TOrder AS torder, TOrderDetail AS dorder, TUser AS user, TCafe AS cafe, TMenu AS menu WHERE user.userIDX = torder.userIDX AND cafe.cafeIDX = torder.cafeIDX AND menu.menuIDX = dorder.menuIDX AND dorder.orderDetailIDX = torder.orderDetailIDX AND torder.cafeIDX = #{cafeIDX} ORDER BY torder.orderIDX DESC
SELECT noticeParentIDX, noticeTitle, noticeCnt, noticeCreDtm FROM TNoticeBoard WHERE noticeDel = 0 AND cafeIDX = #{cafeIDX} ORDER BY noticeParentIDX DESC

SELECT menu.menuName, dorder.menuQuantity, torder.orderReceivedTime, torder.orderFlag FROM TOrder AS torder, TOrderDetail AS dorder, TUser AS user, TCafe AS cafe, TMenu AS menu WHERE user.userIDX = torder.userIDX AND cafe.cafeIDX = torder.cafeIDX AND menu.menuIDX = dorder.menuIDX AND dorder.orderDetailIDX = torder.orderDetailIDX AND torder.cafeIDX = #{cafeIDX} AND user.userNickname = #{userNickname} ORDER BY torder.orderIDX DESC
